# Shashwat Shukla CLI

A minimal developer CLI to view my resume, projects, and professional profile.

## Install
```bash
pip install shashwat-shukla
shashwat-shukla --help     → shows all options
shashwat-shukla --version  → prints version
shashwat-shukla resume     → opens PDF
shashwat-shukla projects   → opens GitHub
shashwat-shukla linkedin   → opens LinkedIn
shashwat-shukla upgrade    → upgrades package
